descriptionHtml:
[center]
[img]http://img109.imageshack.us/img109/4350/screenshot3479.png[/img]
[b]Hello again.[/b]
I\'ve decided to make another Marcurio change. I hope you enjoy a new handsome version of yours old little crazy mage friend. He is little vampirised, but not that much. Ive add him a little less \"japanesee\" eyes. Make him bigger (for girls who likes bid bad boys). And offcorse ive change his eyes to this weird light grey, so he look amaizing in night lights.

And finally ive add him some vampire spells. He will use it sometimes. And look at his pretty... Teth... You know... That big, white fang\'s...

I Also change him defalut outfit to Warlock : ) Becose i like the way he look in this black outfit ; )

[i]Sorry for my english, im still learning. And sorry for uploading once more, ive deleted old flle by mistake _-_[/i]


[img]http://img825.imageshack.us/img825/1996/marcurio.png[/img][/center]


[b]My other mod\'s:[/b]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=9809]Calder Better Look[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=9974#]Belrand New Strength[/url]

[b]To do list:[/b]
Better Brynjolf possible Follower (Now its broke plot, so i cant add him : / i must to get known how to use CK, and then i will try to make him your companion... Why Bestheda gived him so perfect voice, and didint make him possible follower?).
Better J\'Zargo.
Ugly man to handsome man.
author: Gnatozuj
